attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Obesity - no wonder, the cheapest Sporting activity I can find is £12 an hour for a badminton court. I am paying £55 an hour for a football pitch, seriously what are you guys thinking. I thought £130 for my Xbox was expensive, actually its cheap compared to playing sport. 

Kids are in the streets fighting etc, well I didnt have a disposable income of £5+ per day when I was young (the the cost of an hour of sport if you share a court) so what should they do???? They like to go out everyday you know, so 1 hour per day (which isnt long enough anyway) would cost almost £2000 in a year, seriously were should teenagers get this sort of money?

I cant even afford to do sport's now as a 23 year old, so what on earth do you expect from your populace?????

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
